languages.text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость, но я не ведаю ответа на ваш вопрос". {n}Астропат переходит на шепот, озираясь на молящегося технопровидца.{/n} "Боюсь, даже братия Механикус до конца не понимает устройство этого механизма. Мы знаем лишь о машинах, что стоят на поверхности: ресиверы записывают сообщения на бумагу, транскриберы разносят мыслеобразы по смысловым категориям в ядро-тезаурус, затем священный компилятор снабжает сообщения списком символов и их толкований. Но механизм простирается глубоко вниз, в недра корабля... Посему я даже не берусь предполагать откуда могла прийти такая напасть".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость, но я не ведаю ответа на ваш вопрос". {n}Астропат переходит на шепот, озираясь на молящегося технопровидца.{/n} "Боюсь, даже братия Механикус до конца не понимает устройство этого механизма. Мы знаем лишь о машинах, что стоят на поверхности: ресиверы записывают сообщения на бумагу, транскриберы разносят мыслеобразы по смысловым категориям в ядро-тезаурус, затем священный компилятор передает список символов и их толкований. Но механизм простирается глубоко вниз, в недра корабля... Посему я даже не берусь предполагать откуда могла прийти такая напасть".

languages.text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism stretches far lower, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

"Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the answer to your question is unknown to me." {n}The astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing askance at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers accept the raw images and project them on paper; the transcribers sort the symbols by semantic category; and then the sacred decoder feeds the processed mental imagery into the interpreters. However, the mechanism stretches far lower, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

languages.text: «Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no conozco la respuesta». {n}El Astrópata baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro mientras lanza miradas de reojo al visioingeniero en oración.{/n} «Me temo que ni siquiera el Adeptus Mechanicus comprende totalmente el funcionamiento de este mecanismo. Solo entendemos las máquinas superficiales: los receptores plasman los mensajs en el papel, los transcriptores ordenan las imágenes mentales por categoría semántica y las envían al núcleo de sinónimos y después el sagrado compilador complementa los mensajes con una lista de símbolos y sus interpretaciones. Sin embargo, el mecanismo se extiende hasta las entrañas de la nave... No puedo ni siquiera imaginar dónde puede estar el problema».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no conozco la respuesta». {n}El Astrópata baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro mientras lanza miradas de reojo al visioingeniero en oración.{/n} «Me temo que ni siquiera el Adeptus Mechanicus comprende totalmente el funcionamiento de este mecanismo. Solo entendemos las máquinas superficiales: los receptores plasman los mensajs en el papel, los transcriptores ordenan las imágenes mentales por categoría semántica y las envían al núcleo de sinónimos y después el sagrado compilador complementa los mensajes con una lista de símbolos y sus interpretaciones. Sin embargo, el mecanismo se extiende hasta las entrañas de la nave... No puedo ni siquiera imaginar dónde puede estar el problema».

languages.text: 「お許しください、陛下。ですが、私は答えを知らないのです」{n}感応通信官の声は小さくなって囁くようになり、祈っている機関整備師を見る。{/n}「残念ながら、帝国技術局でさえ、このシステムの仕組みを完全には理解していません。私たちが知っているのは、表面的な機械のことだけです。レシーバーがメッセージを紙に書き出し、転写機が心象を意味別にカテゴリ分けして、シーソラスコアに送り込み、神聖なるコンパイラがシンボルとその解釈の一覧でメッセージを補足するのです。ですが、その仕組みはずっと奥深く、船の底にまで伸びています…なので、このトラブルの元凶について、堂々と推測で話すことは、はばかられるのです」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください、陛下。ですが、私は答えを知らないのです」{n}感応通信官の声は小さくなって囁くようになり、祈っている機関整備師を見る。{/n}「残念ながら、帝国技術局でさえ、このシステムの仕組みを完全には理解していません。私たちが知っているのは、表面的な機械のことだけです。レシーバーがメッセージを紙に書き出し、転写機が心象を意味別にカテゴリ分けして、シーソラスコアに送り込み、神聖なるコンパイラがシンボルとその解釈の一覧でメッセージを補足するのです。ですが、その仕組みはずっと奥深く、船の底にまで伸びています…なので、このトラブルの元凶について、堂々と推測で話すことは、はばかられるのです」

languages.text: “我很抱歉，大人，但具体原因我并不清楚。”{n}星语者压低了声音，瞥了一眼正在祈祷的引擎先知。{/n}“就连机械修会的人，恐怕都未必完全了解这台机器的工作原理。我们只了解最浅显的知识——接收器负责接收信息，将其抄录到纸上。转录器根据语义类别，对接收到的意象进行分类，将其输入数据核心。在这之后，神圣的编译器通过符号与编译结果，对信息进行补充。不过，这台机器的线路延伸到更深层的区域，深入飞船内部……因此我根本不敢妄加猜测问题的根本原因。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，大人，但具体原因我并不清楚。”{n}星语者压低了声音，瞥了一眼正在祈祷的引擎先知。{/n}“就连机械修会的人，恐怕都未必完全了解这台机器的工作原理。我们只了解最浅显的知识——接收器负责接收信息，将其抄录到纸上。转录器根据语义类别，对接收到的意象进行分类，将其输入数据核心。在这之后，神圣的编译器通过符号与编译结果，对信息进行补充。不过，这台机器的线路延伸到更深层的区域，深入飞船内部……因此我根本不敢妄加猜测问题的根本原因。”

languages.text: Vergebt mir, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich kenne die Antwort nicht. {n}Der Astropath senkt seine Stimme zu einem Flüstern und wirft einen Blick auf den betenden Maschinenseher.{/n} "Ich fürchte, nicht einmal der Adeptus Mechanicus versteht diesen Mechanismus vollständig. Wir kennen uns nur mit den Maschinen an der Oberfläche aus: Die Empfänger übertragen die Nachrichten auf Papier, die Transkriptoren sortieren die mentalen Symbole nach semantischen Kategorien und speisen sie in den Thesauruskern ein, ehe der heilige Compiler die Nachrichten mit einer Liste von Symbolen und ihren Interpretationen ergänzt. Allerdings reicht der Mechanismus viel tiefer in die Eingeweide des Schiffs ... Ich würde mir daher keine Vermutung anmaßen, wo die mögliche Quelle dieser Probleme liegt."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

traits.locale_text: Vergebt mir, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich kenne die Antwort nicht. {n}Der Astropath senkt seine Stimme zu einem Flüstern und wirft einen Blick auf den betenden Maschinenseher.{/n} "Ich fürchte, nicht einmal der Adeptus Mechanicus versteht diesen Mechanismus vollständig. Wir kennen uns nur mit den Maschinen an der Oberfläche aus: Die Empfänger übertragen die Nachrichten auf Papier, die Transkriptoren sortieren die mentalen Symbole nach semantischen Kategorien und speisen sie in den Thesauruskern ein, ehe der heilige Compiler die Nachrichten mit einer Liste von Symbolen und ihren Interpretationen ergänzt. Allerdings reicht der Mechanismus viel tiefer in die Eingeweide des Schiffs ... Ich würde mir daher keine Vermutung anmaßen, wo die mögliche Quelle dieser Probleme liegt."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais je n'ai pas la réponse à votre question. {n}L'astropathe baisse la voix et se met à murmurer tout en regardant le technaugure en prière.{/n} Je crains que l'Adeptus Mechanicus lui-même ne saisisse pas pleinement les rouages internes de ce mécanisme. Nos connaissances se limitent aux machines qui œuvrent en surface : les récepteurs couchent les messages sur le papier, les transcripteurs trient l'imagerie mentale par catégorie sémantique et la transmettent au processeur synonymique, après quoi le compilateur sacré complète le tout à l'aide d'une liste de symboles assortis de leur interprétation. Cependant, le mécanisme a des ramifications bien plus profondes, jusque dans les entrailles du vaisseau... Raison pour laquelle je ne me risquerais pas à la moindre conjecture quant à l'origine de ce dysfonctionnement. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."

Nos connaissances se limitent aux machines qui œuvrent en surface : les récepteurs couchent les messages sur le papier, les transcripteurs trient l'imagerie mentale par catégorie sémantique et la transmettent au processeur synonymique, après quoi le compilateur sacré complète le tout à l'aide d'une liste de symboles assortis de leur interprétation. Cependant, le mécanisme a des ramifications bien plus profondes, jusque dans les entrailles du vaisseau... Raison pour laquelle je ne me risquerais pas à la moindre conjecture quant à l'origine de ce dysfonctionnement. »

languages.text: "Beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak cevabı bilmiyorum." {n}Bakışlarını dua eden Mühedyum'a çeviren Astropat'ın sesi, fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki Adeptus Mechanicus bile bu mekanizmanın işleyişini tam olarak kavrayamıyor. Bizler, yalnızca yüzeysel seviyedeki makinelerin irfanına sahibiz. Alıcılar, mesajları kâğıda döker. Tercümanlar, semantik kategori aracılığıyla zihinsel tasvirleri sınıflandırarak sözlüğün çekirdeğine ekler. Sonrasında da kutsal derleyici, sembollerle ve yorumlarıyla dolu bir liste kullanarak mesajları bütünleştirir. Ancak mekanizma; çok daha derinlere, geminin derinliklerine ulaşır... Bu nedenle yaşanan sorunun olası kaynağına dair bir tahminde bile bulunmam mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I do not know the answer." {n}The Astropath lowers his voice to a whisper, glancing at the praying Enginseer.{/n} "I'm afraid even the Adeptus Mechanicus don't fully comprehend the workings of this mechanism. We're only knowledgeable on the surface-level machines: the receivers commit the messages to paper, the transcribers sort the mental imagery by semantic category and feed it into the thesaurus core, and then the sacred compiler supplements the messages with a list of symbols and their interpretations. However, the mechanism extends far deeper, into the bowels of the ship... Therefore I wouldn't even venture a guess at the possible source of this trouble."
